entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is introduced as a character who looks uncomfortable and avoids eye contact with his grandmother and Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a friend of Neville's, known to Neville's grandmother.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as a Weasley and the son of fine people according to Mrs. Longbottom.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is introduced as a Weasley and the daughter of fine people according to Mrs. Longbottom.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a friend of Neville's, known to Mrs. Longbottom.

entities.name: neville's grandmother
entities.description: Neville's grandmother is introduced as a gracious and regal character who knows Harry and the Weasleys.

entities.name: mrs longbottom
entities.description: Mrs. Longbottom is introduced as Neville's grandmother.

relationships.description: Neville speaks highly of Harry according to his grandmother.
Hermione is introduced as a friend of Neville's, known to Mrs. Longbottom.
Mrs. Longbottom knows Ron's parents and considers them fine people.
Mrs. Longbottom knows Ginny's parents and considers them fine people.
